LanguageData.WildRose.label: 야생 장미
LanguageData.WildRose.description: Wild Roses are the red flowers of a Wild Rose Plant. The plant is also known as the Prickly Rose, Bristly Rose and Arctic Rose.
LanguageData.Hypericum.label: 서양고추나물
LanguageData.Hypericum.description: 서양고추나물 is a type of medicinal flower of the 서양고추나물 Plant. This plant is well-known by its herbal name, the St. John's Wort. Researchers have discovered that 서양고추나물 alters brain chemistry in a way which improves mood.
LanguageData.MintLeaves.label: 민트 잎
LanguageData.MintLeaves.description: Mints Leaves are aromatic, leafy herbs of a Mint Plant.
LanguageData.Rawonion.label: 양파
LanguageData.Rawonion.description: Onions are the vegetable bulbs of Onion Plants. Considered to be a luxury crop, Onions are used in savory food dishes. A pungeant chemcial is released when Onions are chopped that can craft you cry
